library(plotly)

set.seed(123)

The problem is that named parameters are simply never evaluated. They are assumed to be literal values. Consider the case of
foo <- function(a=5, x=10) {a+x}

And then you did
x <- "a"
...

You can use na.omit like below
na.omit(
    transform(
        mydata,
        Visit = ave(Visit, Id, FUN = na.omit)
    )
)

which gives
   Id Score Visit
1   1     1   Yes
4   2     5    No
5   2    ...
